evidence.claim: 3 Owl utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure and data hosting.
The company supports FHIR and HL7 standards for health data integration.
3 Owl mentions the use of EDI and X12 standards in their healthcare projects.
GCP is listed as a cloud service provider used by 3 Owl.
Integration patterns for health tech applications include EDI transactions.

icp.icp_reason: No concrete evidence found linking to X12-related healthcare data exchanges.
